entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature steady near zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries early this morning then a mix of sun and cloud. Wind west 30 km/h gusting to 50. Temperature steady near zero. Wind chill minus 8 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Snow. Low minus 8.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Becoming cloudy near midnight then snow. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h overnight. Low minus 8. Wind chill minus 14 this evening. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023

entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow. High plus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow becoming mixed with rain showers in the afternoon. Risk of freezing rain early in the morning. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. Wind becoming southwest 30 gusting to 50 in the afternoon. High plus 3. Wind chill minus 8 in the morning. Forecast issued 05:00 AM CST Sunday 12 February 2023
